revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #53 Roseli |image = [[File:Roseli.png]] |caption = This Berry is sweet with a hint of bitterness and has a lingering sweet scent. The scent of this Berry plant attracts wild Pokémon. |growtime = 7h |harvest = 38 berries |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 2,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *25 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Roseli''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Mago]], at least 1 [[Nanab]], at least 1 [[Magost]] and at least 1 [[Watmel]]. It emits an aura that increases the chance of encountering a wandering Pokémon. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 mins 10 secs || 1 hour 24 mins || 3 hours 30 mins || 7 hours - 14 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (wandering chance) | ||
x1.01 ||
x1.02 ||
x1.03 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 7 hours -
14 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 4 hours 40 mins -
9 hours 20 mins || 68 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 3 hours 7 mins -
6 hours 14 mins || 47 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Roseli_Flow_Chart.png|350px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === '''WARNING:''' Trying to mutate Roseli while having the [[Sprinklotad]] equipped may result in your Watmel mutating into Shuca.
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Roseli berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
[[Mago]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Magost.png|30px]] [[Magost]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
[[Mago]] |- | [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Watmel.png|30px]] [[Watmel]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] |- style="height: 55px;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || |- | [[File:Magost.png|30px]] [[Magost]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
[[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Magost.png|30px]] [[Magost]] |- | [[File:Watmel.png|30px]] [[Watmel]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Watmel.png|30px]] [[Watmel]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Watmel]] || - || - || - |- | [[Magost]] || 4 hours until ripe || 2 hours 40 mins until ripe || 1 hour 46 mins 40 secs until ripe |- | [[Mago]] || 6 mins 10 secs until ripe || 4 mins 7 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Nanab]] || 4 mins 10 secs until ripe || 2 mins 47 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} ==Uses== ===Mutations=== Roseli berries can be used to mutate the following berries. {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Petaya.png|20px]] [[Petaya]] || [[File:Occa.png|20px]] [[Occa]] [[File:Passho.png|20px]] [[Passho]]
[[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]] [[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]]
[[File:Yache.png|20px]] [[Yache]] [[File:Chople.png|20px]] [[Chople]]
[[File:Kebia.png|20px]] [[Kebia]] [[File:Shuca.png|20px]] [[Shuca]]
[[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]] [[File:Payapa.png|20px]] [[Payapa]]
[[File:Tanga.png|20px]] [[Tanga]] [[File:Charti.png|20px]] [[Charti]]
[[File:Kasib.png|20px]] [[Kasib]] [[File:Haban.png|20px]] [[Haban]]
[[File:Colbur.png|20px]] [[Colbur]] [[File:Babiri.png|20px]] [[Babiri]]
[[File:Chilan.png|20px]] [[Chilan]] |- |} ==Using Roseli== Farm setups using Roseli can be found here: * [[Farming Setups|Various useful Farming Setups]]
{{Berries}} [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]
